ShimmerDrawOverride Class Reference

This class implements the shimmer draw override, which is a global rendering style that attempts to draw any visual into the shimmer channel. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements the shimmer draw override, which is a global rendering style that attempts to draw any visual into the shimmer channel.
